DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine administration GSK958108 delay ejaculation patient primary premature ejaculation measure ejaculatory latency time ( ELT ) use masturbation model sexual visual stimulation , evaluate safety tolerability GSK958108 healthy men PE
DOC.criteria: Heterosexual male subject selfreported moderate severe primary Premature ejaculation ejaculation occur penetration , shortly minimal stimulation Baseline Ejaculation Latency time < 3 minute Subjects must agree use contraception method per protocol Body weight > = 50 kg Body Mass Index within range 19.029.9 Kg/m2 Subject normal visual acuity ( appropriate correction need ) Subject able cooperate study procedure include eye examination use mydriatic Erectile dysfunction History migraine Current clinically relevant abnormality History psychiatric illness suicidal attempt behaviours History eye disorder colour blind , exclude myopia presbyopia Cardiac conduction disorder clinically significant cardiac disease Positive prestudy drug/alcohol screen Hepatitis HIV test Regular consumption alcohol History sensitivity intolerance drug Consumption red wine , seville orange , grapefruit grapefruit juice [ and/or pummelo , exotic citrus fruit , grapefruit hybrid ] 7 day prior first dose study medication Subject receive continue receive treatment premature ejaculation four week prior study start Use prescription nonprescription drug , include vitamin , herbal dietary supplement prior first dose study medication Participation another clinical trial previous month Exposure four new experimental drug within previous 12 month Where participation study would result donation blood blood product excess 500 mL within 56 day period . Unwillingness inability follow procedure outline protocol .
